cHELLO(String, String...) - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the hello message which is to be sent by the client to the server.
Client - Interface in clientside.client
The interface that represents a Client of the Pentago game!
ClientCommands - Class in commands
The class containing the client commands following the protocol specified to us in the project description!

ClientHandler - Interface in serverside.clienthandler
The client handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when not in a game of Pentago but connected to the Server.
ClientHandlerMethod - Class in serverside.clienthandler
The client handler responsible for handling the messages sent by the client and sending messages to the client when not in a game of Pentago but connected to the Server.
ClientHandlerMethod(Socket, Server) - Constructor for class serverside.clienthandler.ClientHandlerMethod
The constructor for the client handler which creates a new clientHandler object with the passed parameters.
ClientMethod - Class in clientside.client
The class representing a client connected to a server hosting the Pentago game!
ClientMethod(BufferedReader, PrintWriter, String[]) - Constructor for class clientside.client.ClientMethod
This method is used to create a client object!

ClientSideMethod - Class in clientside
The class containing the main method to run the client! Starts a thread of clientMethod!

cLIST() - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the LIST message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request a list of online users.
cLOGIN(String) - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the login message which is to be sent by the client to the server to successfully log in to the server following the protocol specified.
close() - Method in interface serverside.clienthandler.ClientHandler
This method used to exit and stop the client handler.
close() - Method in class serverside.clienthandler.ClientHandlerMethod
This method used to exit and stop the client handler.
cMOVE(int, int) - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the MOVE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to play a move in the pentago game!
commands - package commands

Class for maintaining a Computer player in Pentago.

Creates a new computer player object based on the strategy given as the parameter
cPING() - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the PING message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection.
cPONG() - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the PONG message which is to be sent by the client to the server to check active connection.
cQUEUE() - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the QUEUE message which is to be sent by the client to the server to request get into a QUEUE to start the Pentago game!
cQUIT() - Static method in class commands.ClientCommands
The method responsible for returning the QUIT message which is to be sent by the client to quit the connection to the server.
